meanings.definition: To move forward in a purposeful way.
meanings.sent1: She advances confidently towards her goal.
meanings.sent2: The team advances steadily towards victory.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel advances towards the acorn with determination.
meanings.sent4: His kindness advances through the community like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The river advances towards the sea, never looking back.

meanings.sent3: The cat advances its hunting skills by practicing on toys.
meanings.sent4: Her smile advances the mood of the room instantly.
meanings.sent5: The sun advances the growth of plants with its warm rays.

meanings.sent1: The advances of the army were swift and strategic.
meanings.sent2: The advances in technology have changed our lives.
meanings.sent3: The advances of the snail race were surprisingly slow.
meanings.sent4: His advances in the dance class were impressive.
meanings.sent5: The advances of the storm were fierce and unstoppable.

meanings.definition: A development or improvement in technology or knowledge.
meanings.sent1: The recent advances in medicine have saved many lives.
meanings.sent2: Scientific advances have led to amazing discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The advances in video games make them more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her advances in coding have impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The advances in space exploration inspire us to dream big.
